thread.title: Houston Woman Allegedly Shoots Boyfriend Because Her Taco Was Too Cold
thread.title_full: Houston Woman Allegedly Shoots Boyfriend Because Her Taco Was Too Cold

author: Perez Hilton
title: Houston Woman Allegedly Shoots Boyfriend Because Her Taco Was Too Cold
text:
2/09/2017 5:31 PM ET | Filed under: Food • Violence • Scary! • Viral: News 
Mexican food is VERY serious business!!! 
Texas Police say a shooting in North Houston occurred over a woman being upset with the temperature of her taco. 
According to investigators, a man and his girlfriend were a taco truck at around 2 a.m. when the woman complained that her taco was too cold. 
But after the truck worker denied her request to reheat the meal, that's when things got extra dicey — and the woman allegedly pulled out a gun! 
Related: Taco Bell's New Taco Shell Is Made Out Of Fried Chicken! 
At that point, the gun-wielding taco enthusiast's boyfriend intervened and asked her to calm down, but in the heat of the moment she pulled the trigger and struck her boyfriend. 
Police did not say whether the shooting was intentional or accidental, as there was no surveillance video to piece together what happened. 
Thankfully, the victim is expected to survive — and we have a feeling he won't be eating Mexican for a while. Famous People Who Fist Fight! 20 Classic Vines You Have To See!
